page.title: 10PUBLIC EVENTS__EPPERSTONE
page.content: The{Footpath Walk}takes place on Rogation Sunday.After a service outside the Church,groups walk all the village paths and those from Oxton,Thugarton and Halloughton.There is no legal need to do this but it is enjoyable and shows people the route of the paths,many of which have been diverted to follow the edges of fields The{Police Gala}is staged each July by the Police for the enjoyment of their families and the villagers It includes,tug of war,dog handling and motor cycling demostrations and races of a slap stick kind. { Garden Open Days}are held on certain Sundays and raise money for charity. { Retirement Parties}have been held for Mrs Markham(Post Mistress) and Mrs Bladon(Village Shop Keeper).
